King Kong Vol. 1 is an EP by American rock music artist Bob Schneider, released on February 10, 2015.
Track listing
#"Dirty Feeling"  – 4:02
#”King Kong”  – 3:46
#"Magic Wand"  – 3:12
#"Montgomery"  – 5:03
#"The Fools"  – 4:21
